title: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley shows off her jaw-dropping figure for new M&S underwear campaign
text:
It's been nearly seven years since the model joined forces with the British retailer.

And Rosie Huntington-Whiteley couldn't resist teasing her new M&S collection as she shared some teaser snaps of herself to Instagram on Monday, leaving Cheryl and her celebrity pals in awe.

The supermodel, 32, looked incredible as she showed off her jaw-dropping figure in a racy white lace underwear set.

Wow: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley couldn't resist teasing her new M&S collection as she shared some teaser snaps of herself to Instagram on Monday, leaving Cheryl and her celebrity pals in awe

Rosie displayed her washboard abs and ample assets in a plunging bra which she teamed with a pair of matching knickers.

Adding some finishing touches, the model opted for a set of white stockings held up with a lace suspender belt.

Rosie styled her blonde locks into a blow-dried tousled hairdo, she added a slick of glamorous make-up and a gold necklace.

The model knew how to work her best angles as she posed up a a sensational storm in the underwear set, captioning the three photos with: 'New Rosie Lingerie coming soon..' followed by a black heart emoji.

Incredible: The supermodel, 32, looked incredible as she showed off her jaw-dropping figure in a racy white lace underwear set

Rosie's post sent both her fans and celebrity pals into a frenzy as they flocked to the comments section to share their thoughts.

Cheryl led the stars' comments as she quipped underneath the photos: 'And where do we get a Rosie body ?' followed by a question, detective and laughing emoji.

Hailey Bieber was next to share her thoughts on Rosie's collection as she put: 'Wow. I need this!

Sensational: Rosie displayed her washboard abs and ample assets in a plunging bra which she teamed with a pair of matching knickers, she added white stockings and a lace suspender belt

In awe: Rosie's post sent both her fans and celebrity pals into a frenzy, with Cheryl (pictured) leading the stars' comments underneath the sultry snaps

'Also who's hotter than you? No one,' with Rosie replying with: 'Sending you ASAP. [heart emoji].

While Daisy Lowe simply commented: 'Ooooooooo,' followed by love eyes and a heart emoji.

Marks & Spencer launched its first Rosie Autograph lingerie range in 2012, it is both designed and modelled by the star.

Rosie has been in a long-term relationship with Jason Statham since 2010 and the couple welcomed son Jack, two, into the world in June 2017.

In June, the model spoke candidly about the impact of motherhood on her confidence as she graced the June cover of Harper's Bazaar magazine.

She said: 'Since becoming a mum, I've felt so much more confident within my own skin and much more confident about who I am. It's been life-changing.'
description: The supermodel, 32, looked incredible as she showed off her jaw-dropping figure in a racy white lace underwear set.
